entry.title: Julien added 'Eye of the Needle'
entry.content: 📚 “Eye of the Needle” by Ken Follett ⭐️ Rated: 3/5 📝 "Eye of the Needle takes a while to get going, about halfway through, the suspense really kicks in, but once it does, it’s an effective and gripping spy thriller. The interwoven narratives slowly build..." 🏷️ #KenFollett

entry.content: 📚 “The Case of the Ice-cold Hands” by Erle Stanley Gardner ⭐️ Rated: 3/5 📝 "The Case of the Ice-Cold Hands is a later entry in the Perry Mason series, but Gardner still brings the punch. What really keeps the series appealing is the dynamic between the three main characters,..." 🏷️ #ErleStanleyGardner
